description: When Alessandra and Emilio move to the city leaving their parents Carlo and Anna alone, life changes for everyone. In a few months the kids forget about their parents: a few phone calls, missed birthdays, missed funerals. But the ...
name: Natale a tutti i costi

review.name: The agony and hilarity of parents as empty nesters and the lengths they go to to see their children!
review.reviewBody:
I really enjoyed this heartwarming and funny movie about family and parents love for their kids. I laughed and cried. It was so much fun. Thoroughly enjoyed it.

The agony and hilarity of parents as empty nesters and the lengths they go to to see their children!

It is a familiar complaint but so cleverly depicted the selfishness of children, the parents unwillingness to let go.

The family dynamic was excellent. The opening scene when the children left the home I was emotional but afterwards I literally laughed out loud.

Having children at this juncture in my life and feeling the same way I could relate.

trailer.description: How much would you pay to have the whole family together for Christmas dinner? Two parents are willing to pay any price, including a big lie that results in drama and chaos for the entire family.
trailer.name: Official Trailer
